title: Bay Tides | Protecting the San Francisco Bay
description: Bay Tides empowers communities to protect and preserve the San Francisco Bay's environment through education, community mobilization, and innovative digital tools.

title: About Us
description: Learn about Bay Tides, a community-driven nonprofit dedicated to fostering environmental stewardship on the San Francisco Bay Peninsula.

title: Our Projects
description: Explore Bay Tides' initiatives to protect the San Francisco Bay. From community resources to conservation programs, see how we're making an impact.

title: Events
description: Join Bay Tides at our upcoming volunteer events, workshops, and community gatherings. Find opportunities to help protect the San Francisco Bay.

title: Contact
description: Get in touch with Bay Tides. Questions about volunteering, partnerships, or donations? We'd love to hear from you.

title: Privacy Policy
description: Bay Tides privacy policy. Our commitment to protecting your privacy while you learn about our conservation work.

title: Terms of Service
description: Bay Tides Terms of Service. Review the terms and conditions for using our website and services.

title: Accessibility Statement
description: Bay Tides' commitment to digital accessibility. Learn about our efforts to make our website accessible to all users.
